mapper.sql: id, name, realName, mobile, password, mkey, imgUuid, sex, birthDay, city, actCities, height, weight, shoesSize, size, easemobStatusCode, lastLoginTime, createTime, status, pushStatus, logintoken, registerType, authenticateLevel, level, idcard, totalScore, commentNum, lon, lat, introduction
mapper.insert:
insert into actor_info
id, name, realName, mobile, password, mkey, imgUuid, sex, birthDay, city, actCities, height, weight, shoesSize, size, easemobStatusCode, lastLoginTime, createTime, status, pushStatus, logintoken, registerType, authenticateLevel, level, idcard, totalScore, commentNum, lon, lat, introduction,
#{id}, #{name}, #{realName}, #{mobile}, #{password}, #{mkey}, #{imgUuid}, #{sex}, #{birthDay}, #{city}, #{actCities}, #{height}, #{weight}, #{shoesSize}, #{size}, #{easemobStatusCode}, #{lastLoginTime}, #{createTime}, #{status}, #{pushStatus}, #{logintoken}, #{registerType}, #{authenticateLevel}, #{level}, #{idcard}, #{totalScore}, #{commentNum}, #{lon}, #{lat}, #{introduction},
mapper.select:
select
ai.id, ai.name, ai.realName, ai.mobile, ai.password, ai.mkey, ai.imgUuid, ai.sex, ai.birthDay, ai.city, ai.actCities, ai.height, ai.weight, ai.shoesSize, ai.size, ai.easemobStatusCode, ai.lastLoginTime, ai.createTime, ai.status, ai.pushStatus, ai.logintoken, ai.registerType, ai.authenticateLevel, ai.level, ai.idcard, ai.totalScore, ai.commentNum, ai.lon, ai.lat, ai.introduction, spi.urlPath as headImgUrl, group_concat(ri.name) as roleName
from actor_info ai left join system_picture_info spi on ai.imgUuid = spi.uuid left join actor_role ar on ai.id = ar.actorId left join role_info ri on ri.id = ar.roleId where ai.id=#{id} group by ai.id
mapper.delete:
delete from actor_info where id in
#{idList}
mapper.update:
update actor_info
id=#{id}, name=#{name}, realName=#{realName}, mobile=#{mobile}, password=#{password}, mkey=#{mkey}, imgUuid=#{imgUuid}, sex=#{sex}, birthDay=#{birthDay}, city=#{city}, actCities=#{actCities}, height=#{height}, weight=#{weight}, shoesSize=#{shoesSize}, size=#{size}, easemobStatusCode=#{easemobStatusCode}, lastLoginTime=#{lastLoginTime}, createTime=#{createTime}, status=#{status}, pushStatus=#{pushStatus}, logintoken=#{logintoken}, registerType=#{registerType}, authenticateLevel=#{authenticateLevel}, level=#{level}, idcard=#{idcard}, totalScore=#{totalScore}, commentNum=#{commentNum}, lon=#{lon}, lat=#{lat},
where id in
#{idList}
